mapper.select: select count(id) from event where is_finished = false and is_closed = false
select count(id) from event where is_closed = true
select count(id) from event where is_finished = true
mapper.insert: insert into event(name, current_progress, target_progress, start_date, last_modified_date, is_closed, is_finished, type) VALUES(#{name},#{currentProgress},#{targetProgress},#{startDate},#{lastModifiedDate}, #{isClosed},#{isFinished},#{type})
mapper.update: update event set is_closed = true where id = #{id}
update event set is_finished = true where id = #{id}
